docs.lead_paragraph: A NOVELTY in cross-stitch work, which, is once more popular and easy to do, is to have the designs tinted on coarse canvas, and this greatly simplifies shading and does away with much counting.

headline.main: Of Interest to the Housewife.; GARDENING IN THE FALL.

docs.snippet: A NOVELTY in cross-stitch work, which, is once more popular and easy to do, is to have the designs tinted on coarse canvas, and this greatly simplifies shading and does away with much counting.

docs.lead_paragraph: THE vigor and quality of Mary Lyon's life are very well indicated by a remark of hers quoted by her biographer: "The wear and tear of what I cannot do is a great deal more than the wear and tear of what I can do." What she did do was remarkable, and it involved an Amount of physical and mental labor positively amazing.

headline.main: " THE LIFE OF MARY LYON"; A Worthy Biography of the Pioneer Educator Who Founded Mount Holyoke Female Seminary
